captions.text: Hi, my name is Otário (Sucker), how are you doing?

Hmmm, the Easter time is coming...
And you know what it reminds me?!
No... is does not reminds me the Christ's resurrection!

[Sound of zombie coming out of the tomb]
[Zombie complaining after being attacked]
This reminds me of Easter Eggs!
Wooow that's Cooool!!
Look at this BIS Chocolate Egg 230g
It costs about $ 11.00!
But, some times you can find it for up to 9 bucks!

Guess what? Does this price is really good?!
[Otário making gesture of denial]
A box of BIS (140g), costs on average $ 1.75
Few years ago, it cost less than 1 dollars!
This means that, nowadays, 1 kg of BIS costs about $ 6.25.
And 1 kg of BIS Easter Egg, costs almost 50 dollars!!
[Explosion]
Almost 4x difference in value!
Does it makes sense?
Ow, but eastern eggs has a layer of chocolate, they are not just BIS biscuits!
Really?! Okay ...
With a chocolate milk bar Lacta (170g) which cost $ 2,5 ...
Which is already expensive!
And one more packet of BIS biscuits (140g), which costs about $ 1.75
You would have the equivalent of a chocolate and a "super-mega-ultra" filled egg for $ 4.25
Although $ 4.25 for a piece of vegetable fat bar and a shit biscuit... that's expensive, right?!
In 2002 a chocolate egg was sold for $ 3.22 and weighed 250g
Today, it weighs 230g and is sold for more than $ 11!

How is that possible?!
There's something wrong there, right? ... For sure there is!
The Inflation from 2002 to 2013 was nearly 100%
That means, a BIS egg (230g) would cost less than $ 3 in 2002 ...
and should cost about $ 6 today!
But it costs almost 2x this value!

Or 4 times the amount of 10 years ago!!
[Dragon approaching on the background]

That's a ruge Inflation, huh?!
[Dragon attacking]
[Wake of the Dragon]
So?! Are you going to keep feeding this stupid tradition?!
Ah, but the kids love eastern eggs ...
Well, if you keep stimulating a child to think that it's normal these king of misleading ...
Imagine what kind of adult they will be!
Wake up! Asshole!
[Stamp: Do not Buy!]
And this is not done only by Lacta ...
All other trademarks do the exact same thing!
Want to make these absurd prices get lower?!
So, do your part! Boycott these fuckers!
Always check the price of the kg of the product! It is much easier to compare!
Help to spread the video ...
Sharing, subscribing to the channel, clicking on the like button and adding it to your favorites!
This is very important to spread the message
Because if we depend on Youtube, you know, right?!
And do not forget to follow me on twitter! @CanalDoOtario (all together)
Visit my page on Facebook ...
And visit the Canal do Otário website at:
www.canaldootario.com.br (or www.canaldootario.com)
So, you will always remain updated with the latest news of Canal do Otário.
Even if some company or some politicians try to censor me!
And if you think it's just the Easter bunny who is willing to fuck you ...
I suggest that you wake up from this deep coma and start looking around you!
The property prices, food, clothing, transportation ...
Anyway, the cost of living in Brazil is totally out of control!

And when that bubble bursts ...
This country will break!
Fuck!
[Sound of the Dragon]
[Do not forget to click the like button, huh?!]
[Do we still have more?!]

I hid this "little eastern egg" from the Dragon ... Hummmm!!
[Dragon approaching]
Sucker A. Anonymous - @ CanalDoOtario

title: Páscoa e os Ovos do Dragão da Inflação @CanalDoOtario
